verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <WH1732> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David אוֹדְךָ֥ <WH3034> 'od-Cha I will praise בְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol- all לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> lib-Bi; thee with my whole heart נֶ֖גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged before אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him before the gods אֲזַמְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <WH2167> 'a-zam-me-Re-ka. will I sing praise

אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֨ה <WH7812> 'esh-ta-cha-Veh I will worship אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward הֵיכַ֪ל <WH1964> hei-Chal temple קָדְשְׁךָ֡ <WH6944> kod-she-cha toward thy holy וְא֘וֹדֶ֤ה <WH3034> ve-'o-Deh and praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמֶ֗ךָ <WH8034> she-Me-cha, thy name עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- according חַסְדְּךָ֥ <WH2617> chas-de-Cha for thy lovingkindness וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- according אֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ <WH571> 'a-mit-Te-cha; and for thy truth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הִגְדַּ֥לְתָּ <WH1431> hig-Dal-ta for thou hast magnified עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- according כָּל־ <WH3605> ka-lo-Shi- to all שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> me-Cha, above all thy name אִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH565> 'im-ra-Te-cha. thy word

בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom In the day קָ֭רָֽאתִי <WH7121> Ka-ra-ti when I cried וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> vat-ta-'a-Ne-ni; thou answeredst תַּרְהִבֵ֖נִי <WH7292> tar-hi-Ve-ni me [and] strengthenedst בְנַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> ve-naf-Shi in my soul עֹֽז׃ <WH5797> 'Oz. me [with] strength

יוֹד֣וּךָ <WH3034> yo-Du-cha shall praise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh thee O LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> mal-chei- All the kings אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; of the earth כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki When שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ <WH8085> me-'U, when they hear אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> 'im-rei- the words פִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> Fi-cha. of thy mouth

וְ֭יָשִׁירוּ <WH7891> Ve-ya-shi-ru Yea they shall sing בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> be-dar-Chei in the ways יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki For גָ֝ד֗וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, for great כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> ke-Vod [is] the glory יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- though רָ֣ם <WH7311> ram [be] high יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh Though the LORD וְשָׁפָ֣ל <WH8217> ve-sha-Fal unto the lowly יִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> yir-'Eh; yet hath he respect וְ֝גָבֹ֗הַּ <WH1364> ve-ga-Vo-ah, but the proud מִמֶּרְחָ֥ק <WH4801> mi-mer-Chak afar off יְיֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> ye-ye-Da'. he knoweth

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- Though אֵלֵ֤ךְ׀ <WH1980> 'e-Lech walk בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev in the midst צָרָ֗ה <WH6869> tza-Rah, of trouble תְּחַ֫יֵּ֥נִי <WH2421> te-Chai-Ye-ni thou wilt revive עַ֤ל <WH5921> 'al against אַ֣ף <WH639> 'af against the wrath אֹ֭יְבַי <WH341> 'O-ye-vai of mine enemies תִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> tish-Lach me thou shalt stretch forth יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> ya-De-cha; thine hand וְת֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <WH3467> ve-Too-shi-'E-ni shall save יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> ye-mi-Ne-cha. and thy right hand

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD יִגְמֹ֪ר <WH1584> yig-Mor will perfect בַּ֫עֲדִ֥י <WH1157> ba-'a-Di what יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD חַסְדְּךָ֣ <WH2617> chas-de-Cha [that which] concerneth me thy mercy לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; [endureth] for ever מַעֲשֵׂ֖י <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei not the works יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> ya-Dei-cha of thine own hands אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תֶּֽרֶף׃ <WH7503> Te-ref. forsake
